exceptions.exn: In environment q : R H : Rabs q < 1 Unable to unify "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (n >= N)%nat -> Rabs (?M2363 ^ n) < ?M2365" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally 0 P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => q ^ n) eventually P".

In environment H0 : forall x : R, Rabs x < 1 -> forall y : R, 0 < y -> exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (n >= N)%nat -> Rabs (x ^ n) < y q : R H : Rabs q < 1 Unable to unify "Rabs q < 1" with "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0".

In environment H1 : forall x : R, Rabs x < 1 -> forall y : R, 0 < y -> exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (n >= N)%nat -> Rabs (x ^ n) < y q : R H : Rabs q < 1 Unable to unify "0 < 1" with "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0".

original: intro H. apply pow_lt_1_zero. apply H. apply Rlt_0_1.
